name: Get Valid Order By Id
descriptionHtml:
GIVEN I have a order id

AND I call the /orders/{id} endpoint

AND received a valid response

THEN the response should match the original record
statusMessage:
Assert.That(searchResult.Content.Id, Is.EqualTo(orderToFind.Id))
  String lengths are both 36. Strings differ at index 0.
  Expected: "2cdd6f69-95df-437e-b4d3-e772472db8de"
  But was:  "31fc32da-bccb-44ab-9352-4f43fc44ed4b"
  -----------^
